Articles.Content:
In stock KSP, shadows on atmosphereless bodies are semi-transparent as if shadowed objects are lighted by diffused light.

Is there a mod making shadows completely black and adding diffused light only when atmosphere is present?

Edited June 5, 2016 by Teilnehmer

I haven't seen any mod that does that. Would the shadows actually be completely black? I would think in many (most?) situations you would have light scattered off the surrounding terrain giving a small amount of illumination to the shadows.

On ‎5‎.‎6‎.‎2016 at 6:12 AM, Teilnehmer said:

In stock KSP, shadows on atmosphereless bodies are semi-transparent as if shadowed objects are lighted by diffused light.

Is there a mod making shadows completely black and adding diffused light only when atmosphere is present?
I guess you could install PlanetShine and turn off everything including ambient.
